abstract.t: In instant messaging system, it is useful to have some readilyavailable IM (text, audio or video) which can be sent in case of thereceiver is too busy to type/speak/record for a reply. These shortIM (here after referred as QA - Quick Answer) can be created, storedand used when needed. This document defines a new QA content typeand XML namespace that conveys QA between two entities. The QAs aredelivered to the instant messaging sender in the same manner as theinstant messages themselves.
